text: paswanna mathata senasuru paminenu atha.gruha jiwithaye katayuthu waladi salakilimath bawa ha awabodhaya ha sansun bawa awashya wanu atha.ge dora piliba`dawa katayuthu yedenu atha.a`eth wadiyawan ho wenath wiyadami ho wehesa wimi athi wanu atha.nowisadi athi yami depola piliba`dawa ho wenath pa්rashnayak ismathu wiya hakiyi.ෙmiwa wisada ganimata hoda kalayaki.

namuth arbudaya nam rajya mudal wen kara goda nagu gewathu kopamana thibeda yannaya.2007 di “api wawamu -rata nagamu “yatathe gewathu laksha 40 k da, 2010 di gewathu dasa lakshayak da ,2015 di aahara nishpadana jathika wadasatahana yatathe ” sithamu” kantha samithi 25000 k thula da gewathu waga aarambha kaleya .epamanak da nowa samruddhiya ,diwi naguma ,gami diriya wani sahanadhara wadasatahanak thula da gewathu waga kaleya.namuth sama rajayakma itha wishala mudalak yodawa nawatha nawatha ekama boruwa karamin thibena bawa api amathaka karamin sitina aththaya .manda yath lankawa thula krushi karmanthaya naga situwima sandaha methek mema udyogaya ho mema kriyawaliya paladayi dayakathwaya laba di nathi heyini.
aluth mathawada godanageyi..

thawada pasugiya kalaya pura dhanapathi aandu aarambha kala wyapruthi magin mahajana jiwitha winasha kerunu aakaraya pilibanda udaharana gena emin mema mema wyapruthiyen da mahath winashayak siduwana bawata pradeshawasihu tharka karathi.
godak kattiya me telinatya inna soratha podi hamudurawanta godak kamathiyine.
eki thiranaya pilibanda wiwidha kotas deshapalanika ho paudgalika nyaya pathra anuwa wirodhaya pa ayuru amathaka kala nohe.
